level.heading: Relation to Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act.
level.text: This chapter modifies, limits, or supersedes the federal Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act, approved June 30, 2000 (114 Stat. 464; 15 U.S.C. ยง 7001 et seq.), but this chapter does not modify, limit, or supersede section 101(c) of that act or authorize electronic delivery of any of the notices described in section 103(b) of that act.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 16-87, see notes following ยง 16-4201.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon ยง 12 of the Uniform Mediation Act. See 7A, Pt. II, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.
